trans-unit.target: OFFER YOUR CUSTOMER CREDIT CARD INSTALMENTS.
FROM 2x UP TO 12x. INSTANT APPROVAL AT YOUR POS TERMINAL
Fund your customer with Parcela Já
ERADICATE THE BUREAUCRATIC PROCESS FROM YOUR SALES
LET YOUR CUSTOMERS PAY IN AS MANY INSTALMENTS AS THEY WANT

When offering an instalment monthly plan, your customers will increase their available funds, thus increasing your sales opportunities. Help your customers obtaining what they want and reduce their financial commitments using Parcela Já.
There is no need to ask your customer any sensitive documents or wait for financial approval. With Parcela Já, the approval is instant, without any bureaucratic paperwork.
With Parcela Já, your customers can pay their purchases up to 12 interest free instalments, allowing them to adjust their payments in soft settlements, maintaining their financial capacity.
Maximizes the average value of each sale
Increases the number of customers as well as their loyalty
Business Areas where you can find Parcela Já
INCREASE YOUR SALES WITH PARCELA JÁ
PAY YOUR PURCHASES FROM 2x TO 12x WITHOUT INTERESTS OR ANY FEES
No records, no paperwork and no credit approval delays

Using Parcela Já system, stores can now offer their customers an instalment payment plan. The solution provided requires the use of the customer’s credit card and offers an outstanding opportunity to generate new purchases, pre-scheduling customer’s payments on a pre-selected monthly basis. The customer can decide to pay up to 12 interest free instalments, without any bureaucratic paperwork or credit approval.

To access this system, stores must have a Parcela Já POS terminal or the online app on their website. When the customers use their Visa or Mastercard credit card, they can then decide on how many instalments they are willing to pay their purchase.
When checking out, the customer selects the number of interest free instalments
The customer inserts his ID card in the terminal
The customer swipes his/hers credit card, types in the CVV and signs the receipt
In 3 simple steps, the customers can pay for their purchase in several instalments without any cost or paperwork
Nothing hidden in the small print!
When the customer pays with Parcela Já the system generates a personal instalment plan
Parcela Já holds the total amount of the purchase on the credit card
The 1st instalment is charged immediately after the purchase and an authorization that holds the remaining due value on the credit card is generated
Every month, Parcela Já charges the instalments in the customer's credit card, until the plan is completed. Thus reducing the due value hold in the credit card
PARCELA JÁ. BUY NOW. PAY LATER.
Pay your purchases with your credit card, interest free
Use your credit card and select an instalment plan from 2 to 12 times, interest free, with no other related costs
Increase your purchasing power. With Parcela Já you no longer need to pay all at once, allowing you to better manage your finances
You do not need to fill out any paperwork or apply for any special credit card. Besides, we do not need your confidential data. (IRS, proof of address, pay slip…)
The purchase approval is done over the counter, in just a few seconds. Insert both your ID card and your credit card into our terminal and you're done! You can now enjoy your purchases.
Do not worry with undue charges, with Parcela Já you will only pay the value of the instalment you have chosen, without any surprises or additional costs
Continue to enjoy all the benefits offered by your Visa card and Mastercard
Parcela Já won’t be another way for people who do not have available funding to buy products/services?

Parcela Já created an advanced system of instalment payments that allow you to better manage your personal finances, without burdening your available funding. It allows you to proceed with any purchase, paying monthly, without any related bureaucracy or interests.
How can we buy using Parcela Já?

Visit one of our partner’s stores; choose the product/service you want to purchase and, when checking out, say that you wish to pay with Parcela Já. In order to do that, you just need your ID and your credit card. The purchase is validated within seconds.
What is the procedure regarding the balance on my credit card?

To make a purchase with Parcela Já, you must have the full amount of the purchase available on your credit card. We will hold the total value of the purchase and, every month, until the end of the payment, we will remove the value regarding the monthly instalment you have selected.
How can I cancel/return a purchase?

Any return/cancellation must be requested directly to the store where you have made the purchase. After receiving the request from the store, Parcela Já will unlock the value that is still pending on the credit card and the store must return the remaining value in cash or replace it with another product/service.
My credit card was stolen. What shall I do?
In which day will Parcela Já’s monthly payment be charged?

Parcela Já will always charge your instalment monthly fee on the same day of the purchase. For example, if you make a purchase on the 15th, the remaining instalments will be charged on the 15th of each month.
Which costs will I have when using Parcela Já?
Parcela Já service is completely free for customers. No interests or added values will be charged. Only Travel Agencies will be charged a fee when opening a customer’s file.
What kind of credit cards can I use with Parcela Já?
Parcela Já accepts any VISA or MASTERCARD credit card issued in Portugal. The credit cards must be personal, no business/company cards will be accepted.
When can I request a refund for my customer’s credit card?

The credit card must be associated to a purchase that has been already cancelled. The merchant must contact Parcela Já and inform that the customer wishes to cancel the purchase. After that, Parcela Já will inform the merchant of the next steps. Sometimes, refunds cannot be made directly to the customer's credit card and a bank transfer will have to be made.
How to ask for a refund to my customer’s credit card account?

For any cancelation/refund, the merchant must contact Parcela Já directly via phone or email. Once the contact has been made, the cancelation process will be initiated. Refunds to credit cards have a short time limit after the capture of the first instalment, and this option will only be possible within this limited period of time.
Which types of credit card are supported by Parcela Já?
Parcela Já accepts any VISA or MASTERCARD credit card issued in Portugal. The credit cards must be personal, no business/company cards will be accepted.
How and when do I get the amount of purchase on my account?

The merchant receives the purchase amount in the bank account within a maximum of 72 hours (working days). In the amount transferred, the commission fee of Parcela Já will have already been taken, which will be stated in the invoice.
How can my customers track the monthly instalment payment on their credit card statements?

Your customer’s credit cart statement will display the instalment monthly fee, along with the description: www.parcelaja.pt, on the same day their purchase was made. For example, if they have made a purchase on the 15th, the remaining instalments will be charged on the 15th of each month. All dates are stated on the receipt signed by your customer, who must keep a copy of this receipt.
HHow can my customers receive all details regarding their instalment plan?

When a customer makes a purchase with Parcela Já system, a receipt will be signed and the customer will be given a copy, where all details and necessary information will be stated. In case of any doubts or questions, the customer must contact the store where the purchase was made and the store must contact Parcela Já.
If you have some knowledge or are interested in the financial and/or technological business area and you want to help us grow Parcela Já, send your CV to suporte@parcelaja.pt
Monday to Friday: from 9 am to 6 pm

Allow you clients to pay
in low instalments at your online store
With Parcela Já, purchases at your online store gain a new payment method.
Offer your clients the possibility to pay their online purchases in low instalments, in a quick and intuitive way.
When checking out, your client may split payment with their Visa or Mastercard credit card into up to 12 tranches without interests and without any bureaucracy or the need to have a credit approved.
To access our system, you will need the client’s credit card. Our system offers a great opportunity to induce new purchases, scheduling client´s payments on a pre-selected monthly basis.
When checking out, select payment using Parcela Já tool and select the number of tranches into which the purchase shall be split.
Enter your mobile number. Afterwards, you will receive a verification code via SMS. After entering the code, the purchase will be validated.
In 3 simple steps, clients may split their purchase’s payment into tranches, without any related costs or bureaucracy. And better yet, without the need to leave your online store page
